thread.title: Pornhub is stepping up to plow… the snowy streets
thread.title_full: Pornhub is stepping up to plow… the snowy streets

author: Travis
title: Pornhub is stepping up to plow… the snowy streets
text:
Twitter 
The past few days the East Coast has been getting pounded… by storms. The porn giant, Pornhub, stepped up to the plate and offered to plow the streets for free. 
The adult entertainment website sent out branded trucks to anyone who “wants to get plowed.” The trucks were available on demand to clear streets and parking lots for people who emailed the company. 
“The Pornhub team understands that by this time of year, most cities have run up their budget in snow removal,” Pornhub Vice President Corey Price tells Boston , “and we thought we’d lend a hand in getting our fans plowed.” 
Not all heroes wear capes. 2
